release.description: This release of the Registry Core is a component of the integrated release 4.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Fix replication issue that was causing a null pointer exception.

release.description: This release of the Registry Core is a component of the integrated release 3.1.1 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Modified the POM to exclude the jaxb-impl and jaxb-api dependencies which appear to cause memory leak warning messages in the Tomcat Server log.

release.description: This release of the Registry Core is a component of the integrated release 3.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Addressed performance issues with publishing and versioning objects.

release.description: This release of the Registry Core is a component of the integrated release 3.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Handle '_' characters when applying filters on registry object. Previously the underscore acted inappropriately as a single character wildcard.

release.description: This release of the Registry Core is a component of the integrated release 2.2.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Provided a RegistryClient method for deleting registry objects.
Add registry client support for deleting package members.
Add ability from client to update status of all package members.
Updated RegistryClient to pass packageId when versioning an object if set.
Update registry client to support sorting on auditable events and filtering on request id.
Updates to registry objects no longer overwrite key attributes when not provided by the client. Key attributes include home, lid, status, and versionName.
Remove warning about XMLConstants.FEATURE_SECURE_PROCESSING by using Xerces 2.10.0.
Removed the parent project's Release Notes document. This document now serves as the single source for this component's release changes.

release.description: This release of the Registry Core is a component of the integrated release 2.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Allow filtering by status.
Registry client now supports an expanded set of registry objects. Namely, ExtrinsicObject, Association, Service, RegistryPackage, AuditableEvent, ClassificationScheme, and ClassificationNode.
Cleaned up the documentation and removed the PDF generation feature.

release.description: This release of the Registry Core is a component of the integrated release 2.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Added support for PostgreSQL.
Ability to generate database schema from the model classes.
JSON serialization of Enums.

release.description: This release of the Registry Core is a component of the integrated release 1.2.0 of the PDS4 System. This release is intended as a prototype release in support of the assessment of the PDS4 standards and the system components to date.
release.action: Support to do package level operations such as delete and update status. In addition, allows for items to be published into a package.
Added support for external link operations.
Built in support for replication operations and report on ongoing replication.
Updated RegistryClient to use RegistryObjects instead of low-level constructs. This will ease integration with outside tools.
Enchanced Auditable Event end point to allow for better filtering. Now supports eventStart, eventEnd, and requestId.
Refactored registry service interface and implementation to consolidate and remove redundant code. Publish and delete of all objects now go through single methods instead of one for each object.
Now throws an exception when looking up object versions of something that does not exist. Previously this returned null which caused problems upstream.

release.description: This release of the Registry Core is a component of the integrated release 1.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This release is intended as a prototype release in support of the assessment of the PDS4 standards and the system components to date.
release.action: Ability to page through all services.
Allow a set of Classifications to be associated with a given registry object.
Configuration end point to pass in classification schemes and nodes as one XML file.
Defined RegistryPackage as an intrinsic object. Acts merely as a collection of registered objects through the use of Associations.
Added ExternalIdentifier support for registered objects.
Include delete operation for Classifications delete.
Mapped Product to ExtrinsicObject to align better with information model for registry. Moved all interfaces that ended in product(s) to extrinsic(s).
Make associations based off their global identifier instead of the LIDVID.
Refactored model classes from the service classes to allow for the core to be included as a jar dependency.
Delete associations when a registry object is removed.
Set the object type for all intrinsic objects.
